full_text:

=) yep just about any "noise" will do sometimes
   
  water, music, wind, foil, fan, guitar, piano, tones/harmonics/a flippin chainsaw....nothing. When I think I have seen/heard it all I see/hear something new.
   
  I can hear that very clear below the hum/vibration same as you did.
   
  Misty
   
          Friggin' weird, there is voices in it! I set the box for fast scan, it sounded like a Harley, then did some effects on it, various echos, and reverbs, and pitch benders. 
This goes way beyond anything I can imagine to figure out how a voice is made out of this--mind--spining--out of con--trol...(sounds of branin on htting floor..)
 
 Frank-S
